actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude obligations issued to finance beverage container facilities from the restrictions imposed upon industrial development bonds.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit a tax exclusion for interest earned on industrial development bonds which are issued to finance refillable beverage container facilities.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude obligations issued to finance beverage container facilities from the restrictions imposed upon industrial development bonds.
